start.speaker: Morpheus
start.text: Do you believe in fate, Neo?

morpheus_fate_yes.speaker: Morpheus
morpheus_fate_yes.text: Then you already know what I'm going to say. But knowing and understanding are different.

morpheus_fate_no.speaker: Morpheus
morpheus_fate_no.text: Good. Fate is a concept invented by those unwilling to change their destiny.

B.text: I don't believe in destiny either.

morpheus_explain_matrix.speaker: Morpheus
morpheus_explain_matrix.text: The Matrix is everywhere. It is all around us. It is the world that has been pulled over your eyes to blind you from the truth.

morpheus_offer_pills.speaker: Morpheus
morpheus_offer_pills.text: Take the blue pill — the story ends, you wake up in your bed and believe whatever you want to believe. Take the red pill — you stay in Wonderland.

trinity_real_world.speaker: Trinity
trinity_real_world.text: Welcome to the real world, Neo.

trinity_mission.speaker: Trinity
trinity_mission.text: We free minds, Neo. That's our mission.

oracle_visit.speaker: Oracle
oracle_visit.text: Being the One is like falling in love. No one can tell you you're in love, you just know it.

oracle_guidance.speaker: Oracle
oracle_guidance.text: You have a good soul, Neo. Believe in it.

trinity_truth.speaker: Trinity
trinity_truth.text: The truth is that you are a slave, Neo. Like everyone else, you were born into bondage.

training_simulation.speaker: Morpheus
training_simulation.text: This is a training program. Your mind makes it real.

agent_warning.speaker: Trinity
agent_warning.text: If you see an Agent, you run.

smith_encounter.speaker: Agent Smith
smith_encounter.text: Mr. Anderson. Welcome back. We missed you.

neo_realization.speaker: Narrator
neo_realization.text: Neo realizes he is the One and defeats Agent Smith.

matrix_escape.speaker: Narrator
matrix_escape.text: You narrowly escape the Matrix trap.

trinity_hope.speaker: Trinity
trinity_hope.text: Hope is the only thing stronger than fear.

trinity_encouragement.speaker: Trinity
trinity_encouragement.text: You have to believe in yourself, Neo.

oracle_patience.speaker: Oracle
oracle_patience.text: Patience, Neo. The path of the One is not easy.

end_controlled.speaker: Narrator
end_controlled.text: You chose the blue pill. The story ends here.

end_success.speaker: Narrator
end_success.text: You awaken, free from the Matrix.

trinity_escape_plan.speaker: Trinity
trinity_escape_plan.text: We have one shot at escaping the Matrix undetected. Are you ready to take that risk?

trinity_escape_explain.speaker: Trinity
trinity_escape_explain.text: If we fail, we’re not just dead—we’re erased.

trinity_escape_execute.speaker: Narrator
trinity_escape_execute.text: Neo and Trinity leap into the unknown, avoiding surveillance for now.

morpheus_alternative.speaker: Morpheus
morpheus_alternative.text: There is always another path, but not always more time.

B.text: I’ll take the risk with Trinity.

neo_junction.speaker: Neo
neo_junction.text: Every decision leads to a different reality. How can I trust the outcome?

oracle_support.speaker: Oracle
oracle_support.text: Belief comes first. Answers come later.

oracle_path.speaker: Oracle
oracle_path.text: You already know what you have to do. I'm just here to remind you.

dozer_guidance.speaker: Dozer
dozer_guidance.text: You’re doing fine, Neo. Just don’t forget who you are.

tank_support.speaker: Tank
tank_support.text: You ever been on the edge of two worlds at once? That's where you are now.

B.text: I want to leave the edge.

zion_dream.speaker: Trinity
zion_dream.text: Do you ever dream of Zion? A city where we’re truly free?

trinity_zion_hope.speaker: Trinity
trinity_zion_hope.text: Then help me protect that dream.

zion_explained.speaker: Morpheus
zion_explained.text: Zion is more than a city. It’s the last stand of truth.
